item.description: Announcement! Pit Bull Class II will begin Saturday, January 21st at Lucky Dogs Daycare in Milford, MA and the cost is down to $140! Basic Obedience Certificate OR private session(s) with Cassie is pre-req. Class will cover Place, Stand, Heelwork, Come amid distractions, more advanced Focus, and adding distractions, distance and vast other "fanciness!" Call (508) 634-3037 to register! Email me at justcassie101@gmail.com or post here if you're not sure if you qualify!
item.name: All Pit Bull Basics Class II w/Cassie-Leigh Stock, ABCDT
